title: Cant log in??
body: I dont know whats happening. I can sign into the site ez peezy but when i go into the cilent it says my passwords wrong everytime or that the account doesnt exist. I know im not banned but i cant seem to log in on cilent? anyone else having this problem

replies.body: same thing with me and it wont let me try to recover password or username to try to fix
ok im just happy im not the only person with these problems
yeah its happening to everyone not just NA

We're having a few issues with our login servers at the moment, but rest assured that our best poros are on the case. Make sure to check for updates on our [**status page**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na)!
